availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, sculptor and marble dealer. Native of Ireland. Son of Michael M. Muldoon and Margaret Macdonald Muldoon. Married to Alice Lithgow Muldoon in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on May 8, 1865. Father of Anita Muldoon. Marble sculptor in partnership with George Doyle and Bate B. Ross in Muldoon & Company in Louisville in 1861. Marble dealer in partnership with Charles Bullett and John Walton in Muldoon, Bullett, & Company, in Louisville in 1865.
